ca.tirtech.etchpad.hardware

Class ShakeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.tirtech.etchpad.hardware.ShakeManager

  • public class ShakeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages device rotation and accelerations in order to provide shake-based interactions.

    • Method Detail

      • setShakeListener

        public void setShakeListener(androidx.core.util.Consumer<java.lang.Integer> shakeListener)
        Set the listener to invoke when a shake is detected. It will be passed the number of concurrent shakes.
        Parameters:
        shakeListener - the listener to set

      • onSensorChanged

        public void onSensorChanged(SensorEvent event)
        Handle acceleration events to detect shakes.
        Parameters:
        event - the sensor event

      • start

        public void start()
        Start observing shakes. This will enable sensor listeners.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop observing shakes. This will unregister sensor listeners.
